game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious map leads you to an undiscovered ruin in search of a lost artifact. Retrieve it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a rare magical item

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You need to find the hidden entrance among the rocks and vegetation.
